60476.affected_area: Edmonton (Ottewell, Idylwylde, Lambton Industrial, Capilano, Eastgate Business Park, Fulton Place, Holyrood, Kenilworth, & Gold Bar)
live_updates: Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption and thank you for your patience.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take several hours. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
60476.title: Apr 25 - Edmonton (Multiple areas) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
